backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing ownership, user profiles, access control, earning items, claims, transactions, and VIP status management.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old deposit records to new format by changing empty txId strings into nullable values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level feature requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend file purposes used for build planning and cross‑reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, title, and root mount point for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component providing theme provider, app shell, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/CopyField.tsx: Reusable UI field for displaying, revealing, and copying text values with optional sensitivity masking.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Deposit: Form to request a deposit specifying asset and amount, submitting via exchange mutation.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Exchang: Renders the exchange header with navigation tabs, showing the Admin tab only when ownership or authentication rules allow it.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Markets: Displays market prices with markup and 24h change, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/A: Admin interface for managing deposit addresses and marking pending deposits and withdrawals as completed.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/M: Renders a markets page showing cryptocurrency prices via the MarketsTable component.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/S: Displays the exchange settings page containing the pricing settings form.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/T: Gatekeeps trading features behind login and shows trade ticket and history once authenticated.
Provides deposit addresses, deposit/withdrawal forms, and transfer history, requiring login to access.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/W: Displays wallet balances and activity for logged-in users, otherwise prompts for login.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Pricing: Provides a form for adjusting and saving the exchange price markup percentage.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Simulat: Shows a warning alert explaining that deposits and withdrawals are manually processed by the admin.
frontend/src/components/exchange/TradeHi: Fetches and displays recent trade history, formatting amounts and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/exchange/TradeTi: Allows users to place market buy or sell orders based on selected trading pairs and validated inputs.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Transfe: Combines deposit and withdrawal records into a unified transfer history table with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/exchange/WalletA: Displays recent deposits, withdrawals, and trades by combining exchange state data and rendering a sorted activity table.
frontend/src/components/exchange/WalletB: Shows a table of user asset balances fetched from exchange state, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Withdra: Provides a form to submit withdrawal requests with balance checks, field validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ExchangeAppShell: Main authenticated application shell handling navigation, identity state, profile setup, and admin access gating.
frontend/src/components/KeyToolsAppShell: Main app shell rendering header, hero, security notice, WIF generator, and verifier sections.
frontend/src/components/KeyToolsHeader.t: Top navigation header with branding and link to external documentation.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login and logout states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user profile name via mutation.
frontend/src/components/security/AccessD: Displays an access-denied message explaining that only the owner authenticated with Internet Identity can access admin features.
frontend/src/components/security/ClaimOw: Provides a workflow for claiming admin ownership, requiring confirmation text and triggering a permanent ownership claim mutation.
frontend/src/components/security/LoginRe: Shows a login-required notice instructing users to sign in with Internet Identity to access the admin panel.
frontend/src/components/SecurityNotice.t: Displays warnings explaining privacy and security details of key generation.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Ad: Admin interface for managing USDT addresses, deposits, withdrawals, earning claims, and VIP upgrades with various mutation actions.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Da: Displays account summary, VIP status, earnings, and recent activity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Ea: Allows users to watch ads or complete tasks for rewards, tracks daily limits, and submits claims for admin approval.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Tr: Enables users to request deposits and withdrawals, upload proof, and view transfer history with validation and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Vi: Renders the VIP membership page, showing current tier, tier options, and handling upgrade requests through dialogs and API hooks.
frontend/src/components/WifGenerator.tsx: Generates a new WIF key and displays private key, public key, and address with copy fields.
frontend/src/components/WifVerifier.tsx: Verifies a supplied WIF key and derives its public key and address.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent React Query caches when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useExchangeQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for exchange-related backend operations, including deposits, withdrawals, trades, and fetching exchange state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading stored identities and providing login, logout, and status helpers.
Stores and retrieves a user's local deposit proof with txId and screenshot in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalEarnCatalog.t: Generates local earning items and rewards based on VIP tier and calculates daily earning totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalEarnClaims.ts: Tracks locally submitted earning claims in localStorage and auto-cleans entries older than seven days.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalEarnQuota.ts: Manages daily ad and task quota usage in localStorage and provides remaining limits per VIP tier.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketPrices.ts: Fetches cryptocurrency market prices from CoinGecko and auto-refetches every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useMining.ts: Empty placeholder file for future mining-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayouts.ts: Empty placeholder file for payout-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePricingMarkup.ts: Provides a hook to manage a persisted pricing markup value with clamping and a helper to apply it to prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useProposalConfig.ts: Empty file placeholder for proposal config logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useProposalResponse.t: Empty file placeholder for proposal response hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for loading, saving, and checking admin status of the caller’s user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewardQueries.ts: React-query hooks for ownership checks, claiming ownership, account summary retrieval, and recent activity aggregation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark themes, base styles, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/proposal.ts: Empty type definition file for proposals.
frontend/src/utils/bitcoinWif.ts: Implements Base58/WIF encoding, decoding, hashing placeholders, and simplified key utilities for Bitcoin keys.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Maps various error messages to user-friendly strings with special handling for authorization and balance errors.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Empty file for share link utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling theme extensions, typography, container queries, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Contains project version, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features describing the shift to a reward‑based earning platform with admin‑managed USDT flows and required fixes. Lists legacy Valentine-site features, current problems, and design constraints for future development.
